story:
Campaign Ends Wed. 9.19 at Midnite

 

***Help Us Make the Most Out of This Matching  Grant 9.13 ***

A community member has offered to match every contribution dollar for dollar, from 9.13 - 9.19, up to $10k to help us reach our goal! Help us by SHARING our campaign with everyone you know. Thank you.

============================

Isla Vida

Isla Vida is a casual Afro-Caribbean grill inspired by the islands, people, and lifestyle of the African diaspora.  It's a warm, vibrant place where flavors are rooted in the culture and prepared with love and craft. Expect wood-fired meats, tostones, Cubanos, great music, and good vibes.

Our Story: 3 Experienced Restaurateurs With a Passion for Food And Community

The Isla Vida team is comprised of 3 good friends Chef Jay Foster (me), Matthew Washington, and Erin Traylor. Our passion for food and community brought us together at farmerbrown.

I opened farmerbrown in 2006 in the Tenderloin, an area rich in culture that many entrepreneurs avoided. farmerbrown has now been in business for 13 years and we've been  dreaming of opening a new place in the historic Fillmore District.

Fate Calls

In 2018, after years of searching for a new restaurant space, fate stepped in and provided a new opportunity in the Fillmore. 

The Fillmore is a historically black neighborhood and a cultural hub of SF. Over the years, the neighborhood has slowly lost its heritage. The opportunity to open a business in the Fillmore and help bring it back to what it once was is a rare opportunity that we couldn't pass up.

Once again we're looking to you, the community, to help fund the final pieces of this dream.

What We Need: The Final Pieces For Long Term Success

With your help, you'll be able to help make Isla Vida all it can be. We're crowdfunding  for the last few tools help set us up for long term success. 

  • Outdoor Seating: Adds needed vibrancy to Fillmore and to boost brunch sales.
  • Eco-Friendly Electric Cargo Bikes: Help us with our own delivery service.
  • Better Signage and Bar Equipment: Drives foot traffic and boost alcohol sales.

The Community Impact

By supporting our project you'll do more than just bring the flavor of Afro-Caribbean culture to San Francisco, you'll also:

  • Help bring a new black owned business to the Historic Fillmore district.
  • Be supporting an independent, community conscious, small business in SF.
  • Contribute to the cultural and culinary diversity of the Fillmore.

*** From the SF Chronicle 9.12.2018 ***

Rewards

Aside from our eternal gratitude, we've got plenty of rewards for backers of every level of support like:

  • Limited Edition Fillmoe Pins
  • Exclusive Isla Vida T-Shirts
  • Gift Cards
  • Catering For Local Community Groups
  • And more.

Other Ways You Can Help...

Tell your friends and help spread the word on social media by sharing and tagging people.

story:
Our Story

Our family lives in Oxford, Ohio, home of Miami University.  We wanted to provide a community place to offer books, food and drink, in a fun atmosphere where everyone feels welcome.  We purchased our Books&Brews franchise in September 2017, and finally found the perfect location and signed a lease April 2019, at 107 E. Church St. Oxford OH.

With the support of our Books&Brews Backers, we hope to provide more books, more games, and more events for our community to come together to unplug and reconnect.  We appreciate your support!

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are hoping to raise $5,000 to expand our book purchase for new books, acoustic sound minimizer, new books for our Free Little Library, and to offer events that all in the community will enjoy.
  • Books&Brews Backers will get B&B Merch, your name on our Wall of B&B Backers, special offers and more.
  • Money is always tight... so even if you can't contribute financially, you can volunteer to re-shelve our books, or help us at events!  We appreciate all efforts to promote reading and early childhood literacy!
  • Share our Indiegogo campaign, and let's get the support of all in our community to be a Books&Brews Backer!

Share our Indiegogo campaign, and let's get the support of all in our community to be a Books&Brews Backer!

story:
Fresh Eggs from Happy Chickens


We are Rodger and Isabelle Phillips from Farmington, Connecticut. Together with our four children our family farm raises certified organic vegetables for our Community Supported Agriculture program, our farm shop and farmers markets.

We have been keeping our own small flock of chickens for the family for the past ten years. We love raising happy, healthy birds out on pasture where they can scratch and eat fresh greens and just be chickens. Pasture raised eggs contain 20 times more healthy omega-3 fatty acids than their less fortunate factory-raised cousins. They are the tastiest most nutritious eggs you will ever have!

We have eggs for us but why stop there? We want to share our passion for delicious, clean food with the rest of our friends and neighbors! We plan to increase the size of our laying flock from the 25 birds we have today to 250+ birds this year and share these delicious eggs. This project is so important to us and will really benefit the farm and our community. But we need your help!


The Plan:

We want you to have the opportunity to see where your food is coming from and how it is raised. We will raise our hens in a clean, natural and humane environment where they will have access to fresh pasture at all times.

If our project gets funded, we will have eggs available in our farm shop and at farmers markets this May!


The funds for this campaign will be used to:


  • Renovate space in our barn for use as a chicken coop.
  • 17 week old pullets from a local hatchery.
  • An egg washer/sanitizer
  • Feeders and waterers
  • Egg cartons
  • Soy-free non-gmo feed


Our Eggs are Different

Supermarket eggs can use the term "free-range" pretty loosely and despite the pastoral picture of a farm on the carton, most industrial raised chickens never see a blade of grass.

Pasturing is the traditional way of raising hens. It is not only ecologically sustainable and humane but it produces the tastiest eggs. Our chickens have access to the outside at all times to access grass and bugs - their natural diet. We supplement their pasture diet with non-gmo soy-free grain and provide them with a constant supply of fresh , clean water.


Risks & Challenges

Predators are a big issue when raising pastured poultry. Our farm has its fair share of hawks, foxes, coyotes, bobcats and even bears. This said the hens will have access to cover from hawks and their pasture will be surrounded by electro-net fencing to keep out four legged predators. Poultry raised on pasture in a clean, outdoor environment are not susceptible to health concerns and disease issues like factory raised birds and the hearty heritage breeds we are raising are tough and can take even the coldest weather.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you don't live anywhere near Connecticut we can still use your help. Every dollar helps us to reach that goal. We can also use your help to spread the word about this campaign. Please share this page with your friends via email, Facebook or Twitter.

Thanks for your Support!

-Rodger and Isabelle Phillips

story:
Short Summary

We are Lisa from Germany and Karo from the Netherlands/Australia. I, Lisa am 27 years old, i have a Master in Clinical Psychology and specilisation in Mindfulness. Karo, 36 years old, is an Animal Rights Activist, Jivamukti Yoga Teacher and International Vegan Chef. We met in Sydney Australia about two years ago. Since then our common interests and passion have been growing towards the same direction and eventually lead to the birth of our project “Foodprintz: Food, Yoga and Education”. 

With Foodprintz we are combining vegan food, (jivamukti)yoga and meditation practice and education on healthy, cruelty-free alimentation and a mindful way of living. We are both located in Lisbon, Portugal and for the past year have been organizing cooking workshops, yoga and meditation classes and retreats and most recently even a Pop-up Cafe in one of Lisbon’s best known vegan restaurants. We have found ourselves a permanent location where we will open Foodprintz Cafe, our own space where all three aspects of Foodprintz will be acommodated under one roof. This has been our dream for such a long time and we are excited about the journey ahead. Karo is currently teaching classes at The Mantra Yoga Lounge, a beautiful little Yoga space and Asram in central Lisbon but the classes are starting to grow out of it. So it is about time that Foodprintz Cafe starts running! With this campaign we are raising funds for the renovations and equipment for our space. We have a light-flooded ground floor that will be turned into a daily running, vegan cafe with a semi-open kitchen, a spacious basement that will be transformed into a peaceful yoga and meditation space and a private outside terrace that will be turned into a city oasis! The bases are covered but we need your support to turn this into that special place that we have imagined for so long.

What We Need & What You Get

To set our project on stable feet from the beginning we will need an entire budget of 47.000 Euros. Of this ideal budget, 30.000 are already self financed and will flow into the intial renovations, building an extra toilet and the kitchen. Also the basic kitchen equipment and furniture for the cafe is included in this budget. With the budget we already have we can open the cafe and have our kitchen up and running for customers.The 17.000 Euros that we set as a goal will go into two main budgets: the first budget is for the renovations and equipment of the basement. The basement has only been used as a storage facility by past owners. Such a shame since it has so much potential! We want to run daily evening classes of Jivamukti Yoga and meditation here. To make it that cosy place we are aiming for we need to:


  • place the floor: We want to go for a high quality vinyl floor here! It needs to have good grip for the yogamats and be resistent to a lot of movement and shifting. Of course easy cleaning is a must. After all Jivamukti Yoga Classes tend to get sweaty. We are calculating about 2000 Euros to cover the whole floor.
  • renovate the walls: the basement has only been used so far as a storage room for the former clothing stores that have been housed here. We will spend around 3000 Euros in the renovation and painting of the walls
  • replace the entrance to an old escape stair from the ground floor with glass: there is a round cut out in the ceiling of the basement that used to be a circular staircase to the ground floor. It is now covered with wood, we want to replace the wood with a round glass. We will have light from the ground floor coming through into the yoga basement this way. How deLIGHTful! This will cost us about 1000 Euros. 
  • Place a divider: so far the basement is one big open space. Since the toilets are also located here, we would like to be able to divide and seperate the basement. We would also like to offer morning classes and be able to rent the yoga space to other teachers, massage therapists or other professionals. At the same time we would like to keep the space open to host movie nights or presentations. We will spend around 3000 Euros in a movable wall consisting of glass and wood on runners.
  • Equipment: We want to offer our students high quality yoga classes and for that we need “props”. This includes obviously yoga mats but also some blocks and belts. To help our students to become absolute super yogis we need around 500 Euros to start with.
  • An exit to the outside terrace: From the basement we will create an exit to the outside space aka our city oásis. For this we have to transform a window into a door. This will cost us about 1500 Euros.

So we have spend 11.000 Euros of our aimed 17.000 Euros in the basement. The remaining 6000 will be our buffer for surprise costs. We are sure that everything is calculated for but every good budget takes unforseen costs into account!

If we don’t reach our entire goal, we will get started on the basement with a new floor and walls but hold off with the divider and the glass ceiling so we can get our space ready for our students.

The Impact

Your contribution to Foodprintz means the world to us! It will make the difference for us to create a amazing space filled with love, good vibes and amazing cruelty-free food.

Over the last couple of years we have witnessed a growing interest in a more healthy, sustainable and environmentally friendly lifestyle in many European countries, the US and also Australia. With this shift towards a greener and conscious way of life the “vegan boom” set off. People are looking for meatless alternatives and food free of animal products for many different reasons.

The number of vegetarian restaurants in Lisbon has been growing steadily within the last years. Most vegetarian places offer buffet-style food. The number of completely vegan eateries can be counted on the fingers of one hand though. There is no bakery with vegan options, which means for vegan pastry and cake you often have to turn to the pre-packaged sweets from the supermarket. A place where fresh, vegan meals and baked goods can be enjoyed in a cozy and homey atmosphere is missing.

The holistic concept of Foodprintz is unique, combining Food, Yoga and Meditation. There is hardly any yoga studio that offers food at the same time (actually there is hardly any Yoga studio in Lisbon at all) and the other way around no cafe where you can also come for an after-work yoga class or group meditation. “Strong body, strong mind” is a quote that we all know yet we are often ignoring this body-mind connection. What we eat is affecting our physical health and our mental health and so is excercising the body and practice meditation. Jivamukti Yoga is the path to enlightenment through compassion for all beings, we can't think of a better method for Foodprintz. 

With the cafe we will support local, Portuguese farmers and get our supplies straight from the country side. Portugal is a country with an incredible richness of fresh food all year round and we want to make use of that. To us it is important that our customers know and understand where the food on their plates (from seed to plate) is coming from and ideally know the name of the farmer who has grown their food. Also it is important to us that these local farmers get payed fairly for their products and not being pressured into dumping prices by the big supermarket chains.
A “wall of fame” with a portrait and biogrophy of our suppliers will be an absolute must of course!

Although this is the first time for us to set up a business together, we have been working and investing in Foodprintz for over a year now. We have hosted several events under the name of foodprintz: yoga and meditation retreats and vegan cooking workshops, we have been part of Lisbon Yoga Festival (Karo has been part of the festival twice teaching Jivamukti Yoga) and most recently we have been running a weekly pop-up cafe in Lisbon that has helped us raise some more funds for our space!

Pre Foodprintz, Karo has been the Head Chef at the Sydney branch of the well-known vegetarian “Lentils as Anything” and ever since her Jivamukti Yoga Teacher Training in 2013 has been travelling extensively throughout Europe, Asia and Australia teaching Jivamukti Yoga, vegan cooking workshops, talks and seminars. She also wrote and published her own vegan cookbook in 2012 and has started her own vegan cheese line: GOPAL VEGAN CHEESE in December 2015. www.karotak.com

Lisa took a more conventional path, majoring in Clinical Psychology and working as a Psychologist. She has ever since her graduation continued her studies on Mindfulness Meditation and Buddhist Mindfulness. Her years of experience in hospitality will definitely not hurt the project.

Risks & Challenges

We are very realistic about the risks of our operation “Foodprintz Cafe”. Although we both have the experience and skills and passion and creativity that all the different aspect of Foodprintz require to run smoothly, it is the first time for us to start our own business in the form of a cafe. A permanent spot for Foodprintz comes along with many costs, costs that we can oversee, count on and already incorporated into our budget plan. However, there may also be costs coming along the way that we did not anticipated. 

It is always a challenge for a starting business to create a loyal group of customers. Our biggest challenge is to get people in, to tickle their sense of adventure and come through the door. For this, the unique concept of Foodprintz can be a blessing as much as a curse. A blessing, because we will have the initial support of people that believe in this concept. People that are looking for healthy, vegan food and a place to practice mindfulness and relax from the daily hustle and bustle. Through our workshops, retreats and yoga classes over the last months we already managed to draw that group of people in. We saw the number of participants and supporters of our events grow steadily. Also we are counting on an influx of tourists and locals looking for vegan and vegetarian food and yoga studios. Once open, we will make sure to have a great web presence and appear on the relevant social media channels (our facebook and instagram page is getting close to 600 likes/ followers), Happy Cow, Trip Advisor, Yelp and more. We also have been sending out newsletters and we have a growing mailing list. 

At the same time, there is a big group of people out there, that haven’t been in touch with us yet. Due to the specific concept of Foodprintz there is an enitre potential client group out there that has not heard from us yet. Our location is in a busy area of Lisbon, close to Marques Pombal with many offices and hotels at walking distance. We want to encourage people and give them some incentive to try out our concept. We will start with vouchers for the local offices and hotels of “Mindfulness Menus” offering free after work meditation classes with your meal and reduced prices for yoga classes. We are focused and will primarily teach JIVAMUKTI YOGA www.jivamuktiyoga.com

Other Ways You Can Help

We are totally amazed by the number of- sometimes unknown- people that have offered their help and support in a non-financial way. Since it is just us pulling this project off the ground, we can use every helping hand and we are so grateful for all the support.

If you would like to see Foodprintz thriving and would like to support us in a different, non-financial way, here are some ways you can do so. We have different little “projects” that we could use some help with. If you are interested in any of them, if you have the skills for a specific project please get in touch with us and let us know!

The first thing everyone can do and that will help us enormously is SHARING this campaign :) whether you are in Lisbon, elsewhere in Europe or on the other side of the world: please share our campaign and tell other people about our project.

“Project” 1: Donating equipment

This is not so much a project that requires certain skills as it is more an appeal to all of you have residual “stuff” lying around. We are looking for plates and cutlery and furniture that may be hiding away in basements, garages or in your grandma’s overfilled apartment. If you have anything to give away please get in touch. We love pre-loved stuff, like anything in life they deserve a second chance! Rather than buying new chairs, tables, plates etc. we are much happier recycling what is already there.

Project 2: Professional Photos
We will need some pretty, professional pictures of the space, of the food, of the classes and us once we are open. If you are a photographer, preferable with some experience in food photography, if you have a heart for honest, green food, if you would like to make us look good, get in touch with us!

Project 3: Gardening

We have a little outside area that we want to convert into a tiny city jungle. We want to make a green wall as well as a little veggie patch with herbs and flowers. If you have some gardening skills, get in touch!

Project 4: Upcycling furniture

A lot of the furniture we will have in the cafe will be second hand and a part will be built as well from material we kept from the former shop. We need benches and chairs built out of recycled wood and some second hand furniture that needs sanding and repainting. If you have the skills and a little time to spare, please let us know.

On the 24th of June we will also hold a fundraiser and promotor for our crowd funding campaign in our very own spot! Join us for a night of food, music and market stalls with vegan, local products! More info at: https://www.facebook.com/events/137516249986490/
story_txt:
Short Summary 
We are Lisa from Germany and Karo from the Netherlands/Australia. I, Lisa am 27 years old, i have a Master in Clinical Psychology and specilisation in Mindfulness. Karo, 36 years old, is an Animal Rights Activist, Jivamukti Yoga Teacher and International Vegan Chef. We met in Sydney Australia about two years ago. Since then our common interests and passion have been growing towards the same direction and eventually lead to the birth of our project “Foodprintz: Food, Yoga and Education”. 
With Foodprintz we are combining vegan food, (jivamukti)yoga and meditation practice and education on healthy, cruelty-free alimentation and a mindful way of living. We are both located in Lisbon, Portugal and for the past year have been organizing cooking workshops, yoga and meditation classes and retreats and most recently even a Pop-up Cafe in one of Lisbon’s best known vegan restaurants. We have found ourselves a permanent location where we will open Foodprintz Cafe, our own space where all three aspects of Foodprintz will be acommodated under one roof. This has been our dream for such a long time and we are excited about the journey ahead. Karo is currently teaching classes at The Mantra Yoga Lounge, a beautiful little Yoga space and Asram in central Lisbon but the classes are starting to grow out of it. So it is about time that Foodprintz Cafe starts running! With this campaign we are raising funds for the renovations and equipment for our space. We have a light-flooded ground floor that will be turned into a daily running, vegan cafe with a semi-open kitchen, a spacious basement that will be transformed into a peaceful yoga and meditation space and a private outside terrace that will be turned into a city oasis! The bases are covered but we need your support to turn this into that special place that we have imagined for so long.
   What We Need & What You Get 
To set our project on stable feet from the beginning we will need an entire budget of 47.000 Euros. Of this ideal budget, 30.000 are already self financed and will flow into the intial renovations, building an extra toilet and the kitchen. Also the basic kitchen equipment and furniture for the cafe is included in this budget. With the budget we already have we can open the cafe and have our kitchen up and running for customers.The 17.000 Euros that we set as a goal will go into two main budgets: the first budget is for the renovations and equipment of the basement. The basement has only been used as a storage facility by past owners. Such a shame since it has so much potential! We want to run daily evening classes of Jivamukti Yoga and meditation here. To make it that cosy place we are aiming for we need to:
place the floor: We want to go for a high quality vinyl floor here! It needs to have good grip for the yogamats and be resistent to a lot of movement and shifting. Of course easy cleaning is a must. After all Jivamukti Yoga Classes tend to get sweaty. We are calculating about 2000 Euros to cover the whole floor.

renovate the walls: the basement has only been used so far as a storage room for the former clothing stores that have been housed here. We will spend around 3000 Euros in the renovation and painting of the walls

replace the entrance to an old escape stair from the ground floor with glass: there is a round cut out in the ceiling of the basement that used to be a circular staircase to the ground floor. It is now covered with wood, we want to replace the wood with a round glass. We will have light from the ground floor coming through into the yoga basement this way. How deLIGHTful! This will cost us about 1000 Euros. 
Place a divider: so far the basement is one big open space. Since the toilets are also located here, we would like to be able to divide and seperate the basement. We would also like to offer morning classes and be able to rent the yoga space to other teachers, massage therapists or other professionals. At the same time we would like to keep the space open to host movie nights or presentations. We will spend around 3000 Euros in a movable wall consisting of glass and wood on runners.
Equipment: We want to offer our students high quality yoga classes and for that we need “props”. This includes obviously yoga mats but also some blocks and belts. To help our students to become absolute super yogis we need around 500 Euros to start with.
An exit to the outside terrace: From the basement we will create an exit to the outside space aka our city oásis. For this we have to transform a window into a door. This will cost us about 1500 Euros.


So we have spend 11.000 Euros of our aimed 17.000 Euros in the basement. The remaining 6000 will be our buffer for surprise costs. We are sure that everything is calculated for but every good budget takes unforseen costs into account!
If we don’t reach our entire goal, we will get started on the basement with a new floor and walls but hold off with the divider and the glass ceiling so we can get our space ready for our students.
The Impact 
Your contribution to Foodprintz means the world to us! It will make the difference for us to create a amazing space filled with love, good vibes and amazing cruelty-free food.


Over the last couple of years we have witnessed a growing interest in a more healthy, sustainable and environmentally friendly lifestyle in many European countries, the US and also Australia. With this shift towards a greener and conscious way of life the “vegan boom” set off. People are looking for meatless alternatives and food free of animal products for many different reasons.


The number of vegetarian restaurants in Lisbon has been growing steadily within the last years. Most vegetarian places offer buffet-style food. The number of completely vegan eateries can be counted on the fingers of one hand though. There is no bakery with vegan options, which means for vegan pastry and cake you often have to turn to the pre-packaged sweets from the supermarket. A place where fresh, vegan meals and baked goods can be enjoyed in a cozy and homey atmosphere is missing.

The holistic concept of Foodprintz is unique, combining Food, Yoga and Meditation. There is hardly any yoga studio that offers food at the same time (actually there is hardly any Yoga studio in Lisbon at all) and the other way around no cafe where you can also come for an after-work yoga class or group meditation. “Strong body, strong mind” is a quote that we all know yet we are often ignoring this body-mind connection. What we eat is affecting our physical health and our mental health and so is excercising the body and practice meditation. Jivamukti Yoga is the path to enlightenment through compassion for all beings, we can't think of a better method for Foodprintz. 


With the cafe we will support local, Portuguese farmers and get our supplies straight from the country side. Portugal is a country with an incredible richness of fresh food all year round and we want to make use of that. To us it is important that our customers know and understand where the food on their plates (from seed to plate) is coming from and ideally know the name of the farmer who has grown their food. Also it is important to us that these local farmers get payed fairly for their products and not being pressured into dumping prices by the big supermarket chains.
A “wall of fame” with a portrait and biogrophy of our suppliers will be an absolute must of course!

story:
Event Details:

Location: University of Michigan Power Center for the Performing Arts
Date: March 22nd 2015 (Sunday)
Time: 6pm to 9pm 

Malaysian Cultural Night (MCN) is the largest annual event organized by the University of Michigan Malaysian Students' Association (MiMSA) in order to promote Malaysian culture to the Ann Arbor community and to strengthen the bond among Malaysians in the United States. Recognized by Education Malaysia Chicago, MCN showcases the perceptions that we have of our homeland into a night’s worth of unique cultural experiences through the collaborative efforts of the members of MiMSA. Following the tradition from previous MCNs, we aim to provide free admission for approximately 700 attendees to this cultural event that encompasses free food and entertainment. We believe that by making this event free of charge, we can reach out to a broader and more diverse audience.
 
Purpose:
This year's MCN aims to showcase the diversified and modernized lives of the Malaysian community without forgetting the traditions and cultures of various races in the nation. We plan to increase cultural awareness among the Ann Arbor community through various performances, a fusion of Malaysian cuisine from the various races, and at the same time displaying the influential musical figures in Malaysia by incorporating their music in our performance.

Overview:
MCN 2015 will include a colorful mini-musical that showcases daily Malaysian lives with aspects of traditional dances, musical acts and upbeat songs. MCN this year features the theme "Techni-culture", which is a fancy word we made up to describe the merging of primary cultures to produce, ultimately the proud diversity we have in Malaysia today. We intend to show simplicity in expressing reality, to highlight the ordinary in search for the extraordinary, and how we live and breathe together as one community through our play, which will be directed and performed by members of MiMSA. Following that, we will hold a reception where attendees will have the chance to savor a wide array of homemade Malaysian food which will feature dishes such as Malaysian Fried Noodles, "Satay"(Skewed Chicken) and much more!


In short, we hope that we've inspired you to attend our event to experience a night of cultural wonder. In order to ensure the success of our event, we require a substantial amount of financial resources, and any amount that you contribute will go a long way.

story:
AIM:
To be known by local young people as a service that cares for, and supports young people, to get the support they need and where needed to turn their life around.

LOCATION:
Staff and volunteers will use this vehicle where young people congregate to create a welcoming and inclusive environment. The equipment is mobile and can be set up just about anywhere.

WHY:
The most effective way to support young people to have a life full of opportunity is not for us to sit in an office and wait for a referral but to meet and be present in the lives of young people in our neighborhood. During outreach, relationships are formed between staff, volunteers and young people and through these relationships self-esteem and confidence develops in the young person and connections forged with support programs and services.

ONGOING SUPPORT:
Young People who require ongoing support from StreetWork staff would be encouraged to refer themselves to our KickStart Mentoring Program. Our KickStart Mentoring Program is a one-on-one goal-focused program that matches qualified youth workers or trained volunteers with young people to deliver ongoing support and case management to turn young lives around.

FUNDING:
Based on similar designs to those pictured, we expect a fully kitted out trailer to cost $8000. this is based on quotes ordered from three different manufacturers in local Sydney metro area.

ACTIVITIES AND TIMELINE:
StreetWork staff and volunteers will congregate at a predetermined location out of school hours. The trailer will be delivered and set up by StreetWork staff and or trained volunteers ready for food service. During the time there will be a light BBQ and refreshments with music and fun activities for those that want to hang around, creating a hub.

From the BBQ volunteers will walk in pairs around the park and shops and talk to young people, inviting them to join them at the BBQ or just get to know them and listen about what’s happening in the area and in the young person’s life. Near the BBQ there would also be some form of activity whether that is a skating pro special guest doing a free workshop, or just kicking a footy around. There will be an activity each week that would promote social inclusion and making friends.

At each location we set up, outreach will continue for a minimum of two hours before staff and volunteers pack down the vehicle and return it to the StreetWork office where it will be stored.

THE STRATEGIC IMPACT:
StreetWork’s programs can significantly impact the lives of ‘at risk’ youth people, reduce community disturbances and government spending on young people, which are conservatively estimates at $71.5b per annum nationally. StreetWork’s social return on investment is significant. For every $1 spent with StreetWork, there is up to a $16 return to the community.

story:
Hi ! 

My name is Peter J Thornton !


I hoped you liked the beginning of our short film which is set to launch the hoozMAD short film comp. Find out what happens next by becoming a hoozMAD fan. 

 

 

OVERVIEW


hoozMAD?  Hooooooz… Making A Difference ?

 

If you agree that we create our own future, if you know you are the cause of your own happiness, then you are already a MAD genius. Inspire and be inspired, and help us create hoozMAD, an international short film competition designed to increase the number of people who are Making A Difference (MAD) in the world.

 

If you think about it, what we focus on expands. It expands within us and by default spreads around the world we live in.

 

hoozMAD.com will be inviting people to create short films which focus on what’s good about the world, and 

thus create an environment where good things can grow and expand.

 

CREATION


Be the cause behind the inspiring effect of hoozMAD “MAD = MAKE A DIFFERENCE”.


hoozMAD is an opportunity to help each other to create a better world for everyone to live in.

 

What you will be helping us create,  is an annual short film competition whereby the winner’s entry is, if all goes according to plan, turned into a major “MAD” motion picture. 

 

Every journey begins with the first step! By giving your support and becoming a champion for hoozMAD you are Making A Difference.


WHY NOW?


NOW, is where we can make the most difference. What we do now has the most profound impact on the present and the future, for ourselves and the people around us. Taking timely action is one of the major causes for success in life.


Your support is perfect timing.


FUNDING

 

Become a MAD FAN, and vote for Making a Difference, with the portion of your cash you have set aside to inspire and create for others. By contributing cash, you will be adding oxygen to the MAD spark of creation 

of hoozMAD and potentially inspiring millions of people.


Sharing your money with hoozMAD is real vote for taking action…

 

PARTICIPATE


We need MAD volunteers to help make hoozMAD an outstanding success.

 

Opportunities are open for, but not limited to hoozMAD executives, hoozMAD creatives, hoozMAD administrators, hoozMAD co-ordinators, hoozMAD marketers.....share your ideas, passion, love and support.

Be a hoozMAD.com world partner in your part of the world and create the right kind of difference. Partnership opportunities available. Contact us.

 

WHAT’S IN IT FOR ME?

 

Inspiring positive change in the world. It’s just a matter of to what degree, and that bit is up to each one of us. It’s completely true that when you give, you are the first person to receive your own generosity. You are filled with the vibrations of giving which makes you stronger and more able to Make a Difference in every area of your own life.


You will also get more good vibrations from us with a special poem and a hoozMAD certificate of recognition.

 

FUNDING TARGET - VOTING FOR POSITIVE CHANGE

 

The initial target is $50,000 which will be used for creating a hoozMAD BETA site to be launched on or before 1 August 2011. The sooner we reach our target the sooner we can make this happen.

 

We are also in the midst of filming our own short film to launch hoozMAd, so some of the funds will be used for  the production. We will deliver each scene as we finish it to our hoozMAD fans first...All you need to do is contribute at least $1 to be a fan.  

 

Your money will help us in attracting sponsorship, strategic partners and investment. Nothing speaks louder than money. So by sharing your cash you are in fact breathing life into the concept.  You are creating proof that hoozMAD.com is already working. Every dollar is a vote for making a difference through film. Every dollar is a vote to inspire positive content for each other now and for the future.

 

HOW THE MONEY WILL BE USEFUL

 

Development of the online experience (site), feeding designers, coders, and other essential team members needed to build the experience. Providing cash flow to the people who create the structure and the form to make things happen, the organisers/adminstrators . Fuel for the road show, we need to market this concept to find partners to participate and help grow this for everyone’s benefit. Plus we need to help  the legal fraternity send their kids to private schools, :-) you know …trade marks, copyright etc.

 

 

SUMMARY

 

Funds will be invested in building the hoozMAD Beta experience to be launched on or before 1 August 2011.

 

Proof of concept! Your support says volumes to potential sponsors, patrons and partners from around the world. The more people that commit to this concept through a money link, the more powerful and compelling the message. Money attracts more money!


You will be adding oxygen to the MAD spark of hoozMAD.


Most of all you will be taking action to Make A Difference, you will be certifiably M.A.D.


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We need collaborators...people with hoozMAD ideas, people with time, people with good hoozMAD energy and people with a hoozMAD vision.


Contact us at hoozmad@hoozmad.com.
story_txt:
Hi ! 
My name is Peter J Thornton !
I hoped you liked the beginning of our short film which is set to launch the hoozMAD short film comp. Find out what happens next by becoming a hoozMAD fan. 
  
OVERVIEW

hoozMAD? 
Hooooooz… Making A Difference
?
 
If
you agree that we create our own future, if you know you are the cause of your
own happiness, then you are already a MAD genius. Inspire and be inspired, and
help us create hoozMAD, an international short film competition designed to
increase the number of people who are Making A Difference (MAD) in the world.
 
If
you think about it, what we focus on expands. It expands within us and by
default spreads around the world we live in.
 
hoozMAD.com will be inviting people to create short films which focus on what’s good
about the world, and 
thus create an environment where good things can grow and
expand.
 
CREATION

Be
the cause behind the inspiring effect of hoozMAD “MAD = MAKE A DIFFERENCE”.

hoozMAD is an opportunity to help each other to create a better world for everyone to
live in.
 
What
you will be helping us create,  is an
annual short film competition whereby the winner’s entry is, if all goes
according to plan, turned into a major “MAD” motion picture. 
 
Every
journey begins with the first step! By giving your support and becoming a champion
for hoozMAD you are Making A Difference.

WHY NOW?

NOW, is where we can make the most
difference. What we do now has the most profound impact on the present and the
future, for ourselves and the people around us. Taking timely action is
one of the major causes for success in life.

Your support is perfect timing.

FUNDING
 
Become
a MAD FAN, and vote for Making a Difference, with the portion of your cash you
have set aside to inspire and create for others. By contributing cash, you will
be adding oxygen to the MAD spark of creation 
of hoozMAD and potentially inspiring
millions of people. 

Sharing
your money with hoozMAD is real vote for taking action…
 
PARTICIPATE

We
need MAD volunteers to help make hoozMAD an outstanding success.
 
Opportunities are open for, but not limited to hoozMAD executives, hoozMAD creatives, hoozMAD administrators, hoozMAD co-ordinators, hoozMAD marketers.....share your ideas, passion, love and support.

Be
a hoozMAD.com world partner in your part of the world and create the right kind of
difference. Partnership opportunities available. Contact us.
 
WHAT’S
IN IT FOR ME?
 
Inspiring
positive change in the world. It’s just a matter of to what degree, and that
bit is up to each one of us. It’s completely true that when you give, you are
the first person to receive your own generosity. You are filled with the
vibrations of giving which makes you stronger and more able to Make a Difference
in every area of your own life.

You will also get more good vibrations from us with a special poem and a hoozMAD certificate of recognition.
 
FUNDING
TARGET - VOTING FOR POSITIVE CHANGE
 
The
initial target is $50,000 which will be used for creating a hoozMAD BETA
site to be launched on or before 1 August 2011. The sooner we reach our target
the sooner we can make this happen.
 
We
are also in the midst of filming our own short film to launch hoozMAd, so some
of the funds will be used for  the production. We will deliver each scene as we finish it to our hoozMAD fans first...All you need to do is contribute at least $1 to be a fan.  
 
Your
money will help us in attracting sponsorship, strategic partners and investment. Nothing speaks louder than money.
So by sharing your cash you are in fact breathing life into the concept.  You are creating proof that hoozMAD.com is
already working. Every dollar is a vote for making a difference through film.
Every dollar is a vote to inspire positive content for each other now and for
the future.
 
HOW THE MONEY WILL BE USEFUL
 
Development
of the online experience (site), feeding designers, coders, and other essential
team members needed to build the experience. Providing cash flow to the people
who create the structure and the form to make things happen, the organisers/adminstrators
. Fuel for the road show, we need to market this concept to find partners to
participate and help grow this for everyone’s benefit. Plus we need to help  the legal fraternity send their kids to
private schools, :-) you know …trade marks, copyright etc.
  
SUMMARY
 
Funds
will be invested in building the hoozMAD Beta experience to be launched on or
before 1 August 2011.
 
Proof
of concept! Your support says volumes to
potential sponsors, patrons and partners from around the world. The more people
that commit to this concept through a money link, the more powerful and
compelling the message. Money attracts more money!

You
will be adding oxygen to the MAD spark of hoozMAD.

Most
of all you will be taking action to Make A Difference, you will be certifiably M.A.D.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
We
need collaborators...people with hoozMAD ideas, people with time, people with good hoozMAD energy and people with a hoozMAD vision.

Contact
us at hoozmad@hoozmad.com.

story:
I am a cosmetics chemist from Brazil and created many products for myself and other companies. But FabuLegs is special.  It's my own invention that helps cover imperfections and make your legs look beautiful!  I have created the product, packaging, labels and website...and have been selling online for several months. 
 
However, I really have not had the funds to market this product properly. This funding campaign would help me bring this product to its full fruition and get it into the market.

 

What We Need / How Funds Will Be Used

It's pretty straight forward. We need money for marketing and promotion.  We'll be using the funds for the following types of strategies:

  • Online advertising (PPC, CPM and CPL campaigns).
  • Building an affiliate program and campaigns.
  • Press and publicity.
  • Event marketing (fashion shows, festivals, etc.).
  • Social Media Marketing.
  • Other marketing strategies.

We feel we need at least 12,000 to make an effective splash for our product. The more funding, the more we can do. We expect to be able to use 80% of the funds for advertising and media (and related services) and 20% for infra-structure and management of our marketing efforts.

 

The Perks

We are offering products, goodies and, most important, a chance to become part of our advertising campaigns by appearing in our ads.  You don't heve to have perfect legs to appear -- just a willingness to show them off and become a FabuLegs girl.

Here's an example of our ads (this could be you)...

Other Ways To Help

For anyone who has a blog or other way of promoting this funding campaign, we'll reciprocate by spending our advertising dollars on your website.  If you can help bring funders by mentioning our campaign...then it makes sense that your site would also be a great place for us to advertise.

story:
Our Story

We are Hannah Owen and K.C. Clifford, two girls who want to make a difference just like you. For the last several months, we've gotten to know a young lady who comes from poverty. She is college-age, living here in Oklahoma on an athletic scholarship. She is the first in her family to go to college. When she came here for school this Fall, she left behind her vehicle so that her mom could continue to work to provide for the 9 family members living in their two-bedroom home. We are choosing to keep her identity private, in the best interests of her and her family. She has asked us for nothing. We just want to help.

Our hope is that you would partner with us to send her home for the holidays, to put an abundant meal on the family's table, and to provide a few gifts for each family member. Big meals and presents have never been an option for this family. We hope they can be this year.

The Impact

For most of us, Christmas is a time of giving and receiving, enjoying riches we often take for granted. We know many of you have generous and compassionate hearts, and that's why we're reaching out to let you know about this opportunity to change the course of another family's holiday season.


Her mother, a single mom, works 7 days a week, 14 hours a day to barely provide the basic necessities for her family. If we don't succeed, this student will not be home with her family for Christmas, and they will go without another year.


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is in 3 parts: Travel, food, gifts. If we are able to raise $1,000 or more, with your help we will provide all 3 parts of this vision for the family. If we fall short of our goal, we will prioritize travel first, food second, and gifts third. We sincerely hope you will join us in providing all three!


We plan to purchase a plane ticket for her to go home, estimated between $500-600. We are contacting a grocery store in her hometown to deliver food for the 9 family members for Christmas, estimated around $200. The rest of the funds will be divided for gifts, beginning with the small children in her family.


What do you get? The reward that comes with giving to those in need.


Other Ways You Can Help

You can give as little as $1 or as much as you want! We do understand not everyone can give, especially at this time of year. If you can't give financially but still want to help, you can do so by using the "Share" tools on our profile page to spread the word via email, Facebook and Twitter! You can make a difference!

story:
Our Story

Show and Tell, the brain child of retail veterans Alyah Baker and Nichole Payton, is a lifestyle brand, concept shop, gallery, and gathering space slated to open July 2011 in the vibrant Downtown Oakland/Lake Merritt neighborhood. The idea for Show and Tell came out of Baker and Payton's shared desire to make their community and the broader world a better and more stylish place, while having as much fun as possible.

Concept Shop

Show and Tell will serve as a platform for unique, fashion forward apparel and accessories, artwork, and housewares with a focus on:

·        local independent designers

·        sustainable fashion

·        cause driven brands (i.e. toms, feed projects, warby parker)

·        ethically sourced and produced goods

·        products made in the USA

 

Community

Show and Tell is committed to the revitalization of Oakland and will partner with carefully selected local organizations and non-profits. Our partner organizations will advocate for the advancement of education, arts, women, and other underserved groups within our community. 

 

The Impact

Show and Tell will be the first shop of its kind to serve Oakland. With your support we will establish Show and Tell  as the go-to destination for those who want to shop responsibly without sacrificing great style. Together we will shift the paradigm of consumption in our community and the world at large.

In preparation for our launch we have been working around the clock building relationships with artisans, designers, and brands that share our vision. Check out our Facebook page for a sneak peek of what will soon be on our shelves.

 

Why we need your help and what you will get in return:

Opening a retail space is no small feat.  We need a total of $13,500 to fix up and furnish our new retail space and to keep the shelves stocked. That's where you guys come in! We are currently 44.4% of the way to our goal with $6,000 raised thus far. With your support we will raise the remainder of the funds to help make Show and Tell a reality.

W are very thankful for every donation and to prove it we have a few tokens of appreciation. Check out our list of perks for the details.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the Word:

We know that everyone will not be able to donate money, but everyone can lend support by spreading the word about show and tell. Let your family and friends know, like us on Facebook, and share on twitter, tumblr, and wherever else you see fit. The more people who know the more likely we are to reach our goal.


Donate Supplies and Sweat:

In addition to monetary donations we need your manpower!  We are also looking for great vintage furnishings and fixtures for our location. If you are interested in helping send us a message at showandtell2011@gmail.com. We will gladly put you to work!

story:
Rio de Janeiro is in a State of Emergency.

Urban planning in Rio de Janeiro has historically been a tool of social exclusion, segregation, displacement, violence, control and gentrification in the name of "progress" and "development." For the past century, under the paradigms of modernist urbanization and ever-growing capitalism, the city has undergone a process of obscuring poverty through the eradication of communities that officials have deemed marginal and the appropriation of urban space based on elitist and foreign interests. In recent years, this pattern has been accelerated and strengthened as all levels of Brazilian government have adopted the pursuit and production of Mega-events in Rio-- the 2007 Pan American games, the 2014 World Cup and 2016 Olympics—as a way of imposing its neo-liberal urban development project.



Unlike many other cities that have hosted Mega-events, Rio is defined by profound social inequalities and a history of exclusion. As the city polishes its image for the foreign eye and makes plans for new stadiums, roads, hotels and other related infrastructure to accommodate the Mega-events, hundreds of lower class neighborhoods in Rio are being demolished and evacuated. Most of the affected communities are being dislocated without prior notice, fair compensation, or participation in the resettlement process, resulting in homelessness and displacement of families and individuals from their homes, jobs, communities, basic services and livelihoods.





My Story.

My name is Bárbara de Paula da Silva. I am an activist, a multi-media artist, a Rio de Janeiro native and currently a senior at Hampshire College in Amherst, MA. I have been both studying and working on issues relating to urban policy, environmental justice, identity politics and immigration for the past years, and I am fully committed to continuing my work in social justice and grassroots organizing.



This project is part of my senior thesis, "Contested Geographies: Control and Reclaiming of Urban Space in Rio de Janeiro," which speaks to the effects of the upcoming Mega-events on the geography of the city, the rupture and displacement of communities and the struggles and strategies of grassroots resistance.



“Contested Geographies” is a three-pronged thesis, consisting of a written critical analysis, a series of counter-maps and a multi-media installation.

For all three parts of my thesis, I will need to be drawing from primary resources: collected oral histories, ethnographic research and compiled video footage in Rio de Janeiro.



This is where I need your help.





The Impact.

By giving a donation to this project, I will be able to travel to Rio for six weeks to document the effects of the upcoming Mega-events on the city at large and specifically on two communities that are currently resisting threats of forced evictions and displacement: Arroio Pavuna and Vila Mimosa. Both of these case studies will illustrate the ongoing process of gentrification and (therefore) exclusion, violation, displacement, disempowerment and segregation of marginalized communities under the guise of "development". Moreover, they provide two different examples of the ways in which communities are organizing and fighting back.

There is strength and power in the stories of these communities. This project is a tool to connect access to resources/media with collective stories of place-based activism so that we can unite to create change.



What I need.

The goal of this campaign is to raise $2,000. All funding will go towards the following:



-Round-trip ticket to Rio de Janeiro for six weeks to conduct crucial research, interviews and on-site footage.

-Tapes, DVDs and other small electronics for conducting interviews and compiling footage.

-Additional funding will go directly towards grassroots community efforts and organizations that I will work with in Rio.



Donate, even if the smallest amount, to make this project possible. Every contribution counts!

Other Ways You Can Help.

Social Justice work is a collaborative effort and it begins by raising awareness. So even if you cannot make a contribution today, help by getting the word out to all your friends and family. Please pass along this website's address. Blog about it, tweet it, post it on facebook, or spread the information through word of mouth. Help me make some noise about the injustices happening in Rio!

story:
Our successful & viral campaign ended on 5/19/2015 and  KosherSwitch® is now a shipping product: BUY NOW or learn more at KosherSwitch.com.

___________________
Experiencing difficulties watching our video here? View it directly on YouTube
The KosherSwitch® Model# KSC-US-1201 is a 120V Americas-ONLY version that requires an available A/C neutral wire for proper operation. See below & our website for details.


What is KosherSwitch®?

KosherSwitch® is innovative patented technology permitting the on-demand control of electricity on Shabbat, while making Sabbath desecration (Chilul Shabbos) impossible! KosherSwitch® is endorsed by leading Poskim & Orthodox Rabbis for use l'chatchila (ab initio). The KosherSwitch® Classic wall switch pays for itself by curbing wasted electricity, and is easy to install/use without programming (just wait for a green Status Light and flick the switch).

Anyone who's observant experiences difficulties with electricity on Shabbat.  Our founder, Menashe Kalati, leveraged his 25+ years in technology expertise to create techno-religious solutions that enhance the observance and enjoyment of Shabbat & holidays.  After years of rabbinical consultations, R&D, and safety certifications, KosherSwitch® is finally here.  And you can take part in making it a reality... Together, we can improve the world, one KosherSwitch® at a time!

Why KosherSwitch®?

KosherSwitch® brings significant value to consumers and to institutions (houses of worship, hotels, hospitals, nursing homes) that deploy the technology as a value-adding amenity for their guests.

Endorsed/Blessed by leading Poskim & Orthodox Rabbis

Validating the Halachic permissibility for KosherSwitch® has always been our primary objective.  During years of development, we've been privileged to consult with many Torah giants, who have analyzed, endorsed, and/or blessed our technology and endeavors.  Some have even provided crucial guidance on key design elements! More details are available on our website: Endorsements / Responsa / Lectures. As stated for years on the Endorsements page of our website: "Rabbinical text at the links provided may refer to varying degrees of permissibility, or contextual conditions ranging from l’chatchila (“a priori”) use at home to limited use within healthcare settings."

KosherSwitch® Technology: How Does it Work?

Like many inventions, KosherSwitch® technology employs simple concepts to provide indispensable benefits. Our technology is employs complete electro-mechanical isolation, and adds several layers of Halachic uncertainty, randomness, and delays, such that according to Jewish law, a user’s action is not considered to have caused a given reaction.  Many Poskim & Orthodox rabbis have ruled that the KosherSwitch® is not even considered grama (indirect causation), involves no melakha (forbidden/creative act), and is therefore permitted for consumer use. When "flicking" a  KosherSwitch®, all we're doing is moving a single, isolated, piece of plastic!  More details are available on our website.


KosherSwitch® Perks

We value our awesome backers, and have structured our perks with the deep discounts that reflect our appreciation for your support. Save 25% to 45% off anticipated retail price. Note: Does not apply now that our campaign has ended and shifted to Indiegogo InDemand.


You Share Us & We Share CASH (or switches)!

We value our backers tremendously, but funding is not the only way to help make KosherSwitch® a reality.  We need lots of help spreading the word, and will thank you with more than a simple "thank you."  With our REFERRAL REWARDS, you'll earn 10% in cash or 15% in KosherSwitch® credits for funding that is received through your unique referral link.*  It's really simple -- no applications or setup needed.

  1. Create an Indiegogo® account or back the KosherSwitch® campaign on Indiegogo® to create an account automatically.
  2. Sign in to your Indiegogo® account (already done if you just backed us).
  3. Use the sharing links on the KosherSwitch® campaign page to copy/post your unique referral link. Your social networks are a great start, but getting creative via emails, WhatsApp groups, texts, etc. will give you broader reach and increase your earned rewards.
  4. Track your progress.  Click: Your username at the top right of the page > My Profile > Referrals. Watch your REFERRAL REWARDS grow as you share your unique link.
* By participating in our Referral Rewards program, you agree to be bound by the Program Terms & Conditions stated here.

KosherSwitch® is Real!

The KosherSwitch® Classic is a real product that's been beta tested in real homes, synagogues, and institutions for over 2 years.  These units are not early prototypes based on 3D printed parts.  They have been manufactured using production-ready tooling, injection molding, and SMT processes; all geared for high-volume mass production. The images below are actual photos of real, functional units.


KosherSwitch® is UL Certified.

The KosherSwitch® Classic wall switch being offered here has been tested extensively by the UL and is a UL Listed device (with a cULus rating).  With UL certification, you have the world's most respected body providing an independent assurance of our product's safety & performance.


KosherSwitch® is Patented & Trademarked

In 2011, KosherSwitch® technology received patent no 7,872,576 when the US Patent and Trademark Office agreed that it is a novel and innovative over any prior art.  The Israel Patent Office did the same in 2012. KosherSwitch® is also a registered word-mark trademark, the strongest mark available.


Use of Funds & Risks

Note: Does not apply now that our campaign has ended and shifted to Indiegogo InDemand. KosherSwitch® is now shipping so there is no risk to delivery of your products in a timely manner.

Since its formation, KosherSwitch Technologies Inc. has been working to bring its patented technology to market.  We've done most of the heavy lifting, utilizing private equity to fund operations, patents, R&D, engineering, prototyping, testing, safety certifications, and much more.  Now we're ready for mass-production, and seek the funds that will support our manufacturing/volume requirements.

Every tech project has risks, but we believe that we've mitigated most of those risks: We've waited until now to accept crowdfunding/pre-orders, because we wanted to ensure our ability to quickly deliver our product. After securing our UL listing, we're confident in our ability to do just that!


*Notes/Etc.

  • Unless otherwise noted, all references to KosherSwitch® products refer to the KosherSwitch Classic (Neutral Required), Model# KSC-US-1201 (120VAC) in white. This version of the switch requires an available A/C neutral wire (usually a white wire) for proper operation. See website for further product details, specifications, & installation instructions.

  • This is an Americas-ONLY version of the switch (i.e., NOT for use in 220VAC regions like Israel), much like the many other Americas-only switches/dimmers manufactured by Leviton® or Lutron® and others. While we’re happy to optionally ship to international destinations, users are expected to independently ascertain compatibility in their specific region.

  • This is a single-pole switch (3-way switching, or controlling the same load from multiple locations, is not supported).

  • Free shipping & handling to the continental US and Canada is included; add $50 for shipping elsewhere.  Note: Now that our campaign has ended and shifted to Indiegogo InDemand, FREE US shipping is provided for all order quantities.  Canada shipping & handling is $19 or FREE for quantities of 3 or more.

  • Perk Contribution amounts include any applicable local and/or state sales taxes of Contributors in the U.S.

  • Regular Refund Policy: KosherSwitch Technologies, Inc. will fulfill only such Contribution refund requests as are submitted by Contributor in writing, received within seven (7) days from Contribution date, and are not the subject of a credit card chargeback or other refund claim. All Perks associated with a Contribution for which a refund request has been made will be deemed canceled and, Company shall have no further obligation to make delivery.

  • Wallplates shown in photos are not included. Use any "Decorative" style wallplate for installation.


FAQs

A board range of FAQs are also available on our website FAQ page.

  • How do I get to your website to learn more?
    During our Indiegogo campaign, our main website address (KosherSwitch.com) is redirected to our Indiegogo page. Use the following address to access our content-rich website: www.kosherswitch.com/live
  • Does the KosherSwitch® Classic come with a warranty?
    Yes, a limited 1 year warranty is provided.
  • How easy is it to install?
    Installation is straight forward: attach the KosherSwitch® wires to the wires in your wallbox using the supplied wire nuts.  An available A/C neutral wire is required. Installation guides are available here.

  • Is this real? I get to control electricity on Shabbat?
    Yes, it is very real!  Many of the rabbis/poskim who have endorsed the technology agree that it is not grama (indirect causation) and is therefore permissible l’chatchila  (the ideal Halachic condition or ab initio). For more info, see our endorsements page.

  • Does the The KosherSwitch® Classic require anything else installed, like a computer or a base unit?
    No.  The KosherSwitch® Classic is a self-contained unit that does not require any external devices such as base units, computers, timers, etc.  When we mention the device’s “computer” or a “micro-controller”, we’re actually referring to a tiny computer that’s included inside the switch’s enclosure.

  • How does it work?
    See the 3D animation portion of our video, or our website for a more detailed explanation.

  • Is the KosherSwitch® UL certified?
    Yes.

  • Does the KosherSwitch® Classic require any programming/configuration?
    No.  Just wait for the green and flick the KosherSwitch®.

  • How long does it take for the light fixture attached to a KosherSwitch® Classic to turn on/off?
    In Normal Mode, it’s instant.  In KosherSwitch® Sabbath Mode, there’s no way to predict how long it will take, since the device must go through one or more cycles, each with a possibility that it will fail to function as intended.  Typically, it will take “dozens of seconds” but sometimes, randomly,  it can take more than a minute or two.


We'd like to thank the many individuals & vendors who came together to make this campaign possible.  Most of all, we'd like to thank YOU!  Together, we're making KosherSwitch® a reality!

©2015 KosherSwitch Technologies, Inc. Protected by U.S. Patent No. 7,872,576 and Israel Patent No. 188,499. KosherSwitch® is a Registered Trademark.
story_txt:
Our successful & viral campaign ended on 5/19/2015 and  KosherSwitch® is now a shipping product: BUY NOW or learn more at KosherSwitch.com.


___________________
Experiencing difficulties watching our video here? View it directly on YouTube

The KosherSwitch® Model# KSC-US-1201 is a 120V Americas-ONLY version that requires an available A/C neutral wire for proper operation. See below & our website for details.







What is KosherSwitch®?
KosherSwitch® is innovative patented technology permitting the on-demand control of electricity on Shabbat, while making Sabbath desecration (Chilul Shabbos) impossible! KosherSwitch® is endorsed by leading Poskim & Orthodox Rabbis for use l'chatchila (ab initio). The KosherSwitch® Classic wall switch pays for itself by curbing wasted electricity, and is easy to install/use without programming (just wait for a green Status Light and flick the switch).Anyone who's observant experiences difficulties with electricity on Shabbat.  Our founder, Menashe Kalati, leveraged his 25+ years in technology expertise to create techno-religious solutions that enhance the observance and enjoyment of Shabbat & holidays.  After years of rabbinical consultations, R&D, and safety certifications, KosherSwitch® is finally here.  And you can take part in making it a reality... Together, we can improve the world, one KosherSwitch® at a time!

Why KosherSwitch®?


KosherSwitch® brings significant value to consumers and to institutions (houses of worship, hotels, hospitals, nursing homes) that deploy the technology as a value-adding amenity for their guests.





Endorsed/Blessed by leading Poskim & Orthodox Rabbis


Validating the Halachic permissibility for KosherSwitch® has always been our primary objective.  During years of development, we've been privileged to consult with many Torah giants, who have analyzed, endorsed, and/or blessed our technology and endeavors.  Some have even provided crucial guidance on key design elements! More details are available on our website: Endorsements / Responsa / Lectures. As stated for years on the Endorsements page of our website: "Rabbinical text at the links provided may refer to varying degrees of permissibility, or contextual conditions ranging from l’chatchila (“a priori”) use at home to limited use within healthcare settings."





KosherSwitch® Technology: How Does it Work?
Like many inventions, KosherSwitch® technology employs simple concepts to provide indispensable benefits. Our technology is employs complete electro-mechanical isolation, and adds several layers of Halachic uncertainty, randomness, and delays, such that according to Jewish law, a user’s action is not considered to have caused a given reaction.  Many Poskim & Orthodox rabbis have ruled that the KosherSwitch® is not even considered grama (indirect causation), involves no melakha (forbidden/creative act), and is therefore permitted for consumer use. When "flicking" a  KosherSwitch®, all we're doing is moving a single, isolated, piece of plastic!  More details are available on our website.





KosherSwitch® Perks


We value our awesome backers, and have structured our perks with the deep discounts that reflect our appreciation for your support. Save 25% to 45% off anticipated retail price. Note: Does not apply now that our campaign has ended and shifted to Indiegogo InDemand.



You Share Us & We Share CASH (or switches)!


We value our backers tremendously, but funding is not the only way to help make KosherSwitch® a reality.  We need lots of help spreading the word, and will thank you with more than a simple "thank you."  With our REFERRAL REWARDS, you'll earn 10% in cash or 15% in KosherSwitch® credits for funding that is received through your unique referral link.*  It's really simple -- no applications or setup needed.

story:
Hey Guys,

    My name is Cameron. I am starting this Indiegogo in the hopes that I can finance and start my own business. Let’s start from the beginning. I was once a person that was very over weight and I ate all the wrong things. I was in a happy relationship but that ended and I looked one day in the mirror and saw what I had done to myself. I was VERY overweight! So I decided to make a change for the better. I became interested in the world of fitness and all that there was to offer. After college I worked in the business world in sales and decided it wasn't for me. Long hours of sitting and I wasn't doing anything positive in the world. I decided to try and find what it was that I loved and really enjoyed.

I was sitting and praying one day for a answer and then the mail came. In the mail box was a magazine that I had not subscribed to, but had my name. It was a magazine about personal training! As I thumbed through the pages I became inspired and decided that this was what I wanted to do. So I took steps to become certified as a personal trainer through the national academy of sports medicine. I worked with large gyms and it was great but I was working really hard for a big company, again to make the bulk of the profit and I made around 10-12% per session. Think about that for a second. You train and study and work your rear off for a company to say you are worth 10-12%. SO here we are. I have over 3 years of experience in the fitness field and I am ready to make a goal, a reality. I have decided to make my own brand and establish my own business and fitness line.  I Know that there is a lot of competition out there with big box gyms and other trainers but I believe I can make my personal approach to fitness a reality. I have a strong circle of business friends backing me, so I can tackle the obstacles that come my way. But to do this I need your help. Marketing, equipment, locations, websites fees (these can get pricey), and common day office supplies (advertisement materials) are not cheap. So please, any amount helps.

You train and study and work your rear off for a company to say you are worth 10-12%. SO here we are. I have over 3 years of experience in the fitness field and I am ready to make a goal, a reality. I have decided to make my own brand and establish my own business and fitness line.  I Know that there is a lot of competition out there with big box gyms and other trainers but I believe I can make my personal approach to fitness a reality. I have a strong circle of business friends backing me, so I can tackle the obstacles that come my way. But to do this I need your help. Marketing, equipment, locations, websites fees (these can get pricey), and common day office supplies (advertisement materials) are not cheap. So please, any amount helps.

story:
Ecologically pure fuel – Hydrogen.

People's living conditions, their welfare are connected with  rich natural resources, efficient use of these resources and protection of them. The nature is a home of the mankind, protect, further enrich and beautify it  is the sacred duty and mission of the people.  To protect the nature is the national, state  work.

Protection of natural resources, their effective use, in particular the protection of wildlife resources is considered to be an important global  issue in the world. We also think it would be more appropriate to use fuels that are ecologically pure. Let's protect the planet alltogether!

With the electricity received from solar or wind generator we're separating hydrogen from water and  use as fuel. The received fuel hydrogen could be successfully used instead of natural gas, coal, wood, petrol. In contrast to the above-mentioned fuels (petrol,  coal, wood, natural gas)  the hydrogen does not waste any damage. Burning hydrogen becomes a water steam. In difference with other  fuel by using a very little amount of hydrogen it is possible to gain very large amount of heat.  It is also very useful.  It can be used in all heating systems,  in thermal power stations, in houses and greenhouses heating, in internal combustion engines, etc.

The electricity received from solar or wind generator pass through regulatory and transmitting to the accumulator. 48 V coming from battery turns 220 V (domestic tension) by inverter  and becomes a  hydrogen generator.  The hydrogen generator is filling with water as its fuel. The water in hydrogen generator is separating  into hydrogen by electrolysis.  So we obtain an ecologically pure fuel hydrogen. This process is shown detailed in the video below.
